Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2014 05:18PM momaton wrote: hi all, Hope you don't mind me asking a question. I had my BMX on jan 17th 2014. Today, I am in a world of pain. The skin feels like road burn being rubbed by sand paper. Does it go away? ever? having a really difficult time. I have Percocet, but really don't want to be drugged all day long. Lighter stuff doesn't help. When did it get better? thanks, and much love and respect for all of you, Eve
Posts.Title: December 2013 surgeries bobogirl sandra4611

Posts.Content: Feb 11, 2014 08:02AM momaton wrote: The Ace bandage worked. First good nights sleep for a long time. thanks again Eve
Posts.Title: December 2013 surgeries bobogirl sandra4611

Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2014 08:13PM momaton wrote: Thank you, I read the replies about pressure, sure enough when I, well, grabbed 'em and put pressure on wow! no pain. hmmmm gonna try an ace bandage for a little extra compression . so simple. btw, I had a BMX but I have a bit of a unique situation, I already had implants from years and years ago. So Nipple sparing, implant sparing :) BMX. Thank you for the wonderful, generous answers. peace and good healing (body and spirit) Eve
